en-US.name: drink Pack
en-US.summary: The drink pack is a great addition because you will hear places about drink.
en-US.description: The drink pack expands the set of places shared with you to include places about drink.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The drink pack adds over 10 drink places into the set of places randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the drink pack.  You now have access to drink places!

testingInstructions: Built Using Sample Fact In Skill Purchases
